com.github.robocup_atan.atan.model

Interface ActionsPlayer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SServerPlayer

    public interface ActionsPlayer
    Interface for an abstract soccer player. To be used by ControllerPlayer.
    Author:
    Atan

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bye()
      This is used to disconnect a player from the server.
      void catchBall(double direction)
      Goalie special command.
      void changeViewMode(ViewQuality quality, ViewAngle angle)
      Changes the view parameters of the player.

      This command accelerates the player in the direction of its body.
      int getNumber()
      Gets the players number.
      String getTeamName()
      Requests the name of the team the player features in.

      The method used to show errors.

      Checks if the team is east or west.

      This command accelerates the ball with the given power in the given direction.

      This command can only be executed before kick off or after a goal.

    • Method Detail

      • dash

        void dash(int power)
        This command accelerates the player in the direction of its body.
        Parameters:
        power - Power is between minpower (-100) and maxpower (+100).

      • move

        void move(int x,
        int y)
        This command can only be executed before kick off or after a goal.
        Parameters:
        x - X location (between -54 and +54).
        y - Y location (between -32 and +32).

      • kick

        void kick(int power,
        double direction)
        This command accelerates the ball with the given power in the given direction.
        Parameters:
        power - Power is between minpower (-100) and maxpower (+100).
        direction - Direction is relative to the body of the player.

      • say

        void say(String message)
        This command broadcasts the message throughout the field. Any player near enough (specified with audio_cut_dist default 50.0 meters), with enough hearing capacity will hear the message.
        Parameters:
        message - A valid String to say.

      • turn

        void turn(double angle)
        This command will turn the players body in degrees relative to their current direction.
        Parameters:
        angle - Angle to turn (between -180 and +180).

      • turnNeck

        void turnNeck(double angle)
        This command can be sent (and will be executed) each cycle independently, along with other action commands. The neck will rotate with the given angle relative to the previous angle.
        Parameters:
        angle - Angle to turn the neck (between minneckang and maxneckang) (-90 to +90)

      • catchBall

        void catchBall(double direction)
        Goalie special command. Tries to catch the ball in a given direction relative to its body direction. If the catch is successful the ball will be in the goalies hand until kicked away.
        Parameters:
        direction - The direction in which to catch, relative to its body.

      • changeViewMode

        void changeViewMode(ViewQuality quality,
                  ViewAngle angle)
        Changes the view parameters of the player. The amount and detail returned by the visual sensor depends on the width of view and the quality. But note that the frequency of sending information also depends on these parameters. (eg. If you change the quality from high to low, the frequency doubles, and the time between the two see sensors will be cut in half).
        Parameters:
        angle - Between NARROW, NORMAL or WIDE.
        quality - Between HIGH or LOW.

      • bye

        void bye()
        This is used to disconnect a player from the server. The server will not respond.

      • handleError

        void handleError(String error)
        The method used to show errors.
        Parameters:
        error - The error to show.

      • getTeamName

        String getTeamName()
        Requests the name of the team the player features in.
        Returns:
        The team name.

      • isTeamEast

        boolean isTeamEast()
        Checks if the team is east or west.
        Returns:
        true if east.

      • setTeamEast

        void setTeamEast(boolean is)
        Sets the team as east or west.
        Parameters:
        is - true if east.

      • setNumber

        void setNumber(int num)
        Sets the players number.
        Parameters:
        num - The players number (from 1 to 11).

      • getNumber

        int getNumber()
        Gets the players number.
        Returns:
        The players number (from 1 to 11).
